languages.text: "После того нашего разговора я пыталась послушать, что толкуют про нее... за дверью..." {n}— чуть тише добавляет Идира.{/n} "Услышала... странное. Кровь в прошлом, сумрак в настоящем, и ведет ее будто бы звезда, но куда ведет? Я видела несколько дорог, и все показались мне страшными".

traits.locale_text: "После Кьявы Гамма я пыталась послушать, что толкуют про нее... за дверью..." {n}— чуть тише добавляет Идира.{/n} "Услышала... странное. Кровь в прошлом, сумрак в настоящем, и ведет ее будто бы звезда, но куда ведет? Я видела четыре дороги, и все показались мне страшными".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."
languages.original_text: "После того нашего разговора я пыталась послушать, что толкуют про нее... за дверью..." {n}— чуть тише добавляет Идира.{/n} "Услышала... странное. Кровь в прошлом, сумрак в настоящем, и ведет ее будто бы звезда, но куда ведет? Я видела несколько дорог, и все показались мне страшными".

traits.locale_text: "After Kiava Gamma, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw four roads, and all of them frightened me."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "After Kiava Gamma, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw four roads, and all of them frightened me."

Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw four roads, and all of them frightened me."

Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

languages.text: “那场谈话结束之后，我曾试着去听那些人都是怎么说她的……门外的那些人……”{n}伊迪拉喃喃自语地补充道。{/n}“我听到的事情……非常古怪。她的过去充满鲜血，目前身处黄昏之中，还有某种像星星一样的东西在引导她？可那颗星星要把她带到哪里？我看到了好几条道路，但每条道路都让我感到恐惧。”
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: “基亚瓦伽马星的事情结束之后，我曾试着去听那些人都是怎么说她的……门外的那些人……”{n}伊迪拉喃喃自语地补充道。{/n}“我听到的事情……非常古怪。她的过去充满鲜血，目前身处黄昏之中，还有某种像星星一样的东西在引导她？可那颗星星要把她带到哪里？我看到了好几条道路，但每条道路都让我感到恐惧。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "After Kiava Gamma, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

languages.text: «Después de esa conversación, traté de escuchar lo que se decía sobre ella... al otro lado de la puerta...». {n}Añade Idira en un murmullo.{/n} «Lo que oí fue... extraño. Sangre en su pasado, ocaso en su presente y... ¿una especie de estrella guiándola? Pero ¿adónde? Vi varios caminos, y todos ellos me aterraron».
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: «Después de Kiava Gamma, traté de escuchar lo que se decía sobre ella... al otro lado de la puerta...». {n}Añade Idira en un murmullo.{/n} «Lo que oí fue... extraño. Sangre en su pasado, ocaso en su presente y... ¿una especie de estrella guiándola? Pero ¿adónde? Vi varios caminos, y todos ellos me aterraron».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あの会話の後、彼女についての言葉を聞こうとしたの…扉の向こうで…」{n}イディラはつぶやくように付け加えた。{/n}「あたいが聞いたのは…奇妙なことだったわ。彼女の過去には血が、現在には黄昏が、そして彼女を導く星のようなものがある？でも、それは彼女をどこへ導いているの？いくつかの道が見えたけど、どれもあたいにとっては恐ろしいものだったの」
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: 「あの会話の後、彼女についての言葉を聞こうとしたの…扉の向こうで…」{n}イディラはつぶやくように付け加えた。{/n}「あたいが聞いたのは…奇妙なことだったわ。彼女の過去には血が、現在には黄昏が、そして彼女を導く星のようなものがある？でも、それは彼女をどこへ導いているの？いくつかの道が見えたけど、どれもあたいにとっては恐ろしいものだったの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nach dieser Unterhaltung habe ich versucht, zu hören, was über sie gesagt wird ... hinter der Tür ...", {n}ergänzt Idira murmelnd.{/n} "Was ich gehört habe, war ... seltsam. Blut in ihrer Vergangenheit, Dämmerung in ihrer Gegenwart, und etwas wie ein Stern, der sie führt? Doch wohin führt er sie? Ich habe mehrere Straßen gesehen, und alle haben mir Angst gemacht."
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: "Nach Kiava Gamma habe ich versucht, zu hören, was über sie gesagt wird ... hinter der Tür ..."{n}, ergänzt Idira murmelnd.{/n} "Was ich gehört habe, war ... seltsam. Blut in ihrer Vergangenheit, Dämmerung in ihrer Gegenwart, und etwas wie ein Stern, der sie führt? Doch wohin führt er sie? Ich habe mehrere Straßen gesehen, und alle haben mir Angst gemacht."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Après cette conversation, j'ai essayé d'écouter ce qui se disait à propos d'elle... derrière la porte... et j'ai entendu des choses... étranges, {n}poursuit Idira à vois basse.{/n} Comme quoi son passé était sanglant, son présent crépusculaire, et qu'elle était guidée par une étoile. Guidée, d'accord, mais où exactement ? J'ai vu plusieurs de ses voies, et franchement, elles étaient toutes terrifiantes. »
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: « Après Kiava Gamma, j'ai essayé d'écouter ce qui se disait à propos d'elle... derrière la porte... et j'ai entendu des choses... étranges, {n}poursuit Idira à vois basse.{/n} Comme quoi son passé était sanglant, son présent crépusculaire, et qu'elle était guidée par une étoile. Guidée, d'accord, mais où exactement ? J'ai vu plusieurs de ses voies, et franchement, elles étaient toutes terrifiantes. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "O konuşmanın ardından onun hakkında söylenenleri dinlemeye çalıştım. Kapının ardından yani..." {n}İdira, mırıldanarak devam ediyor.{/n} "Duyduklarım... Tuhaftı. Geçmişinde kan, bugününde alaca karanlık ve onu yönlendiren yıldız gibi bir şey... İyi de nereye yönlendiriyor? Birkaç yol gördüm, hepsi de yüreğimi dehşetle doldurdu."
languages.original_text: "After that conversation, I tried to listen to what was being said about her... beyond the door..." {n}Idira adds in a murmur.{/n} "What I heard was... strange. Blood in her past, twilight in her present, and something like a star leading her? But where is it leading her? I saw several roads, and all of them frightened me."

traits.locale_text: "Konuşmanın ardından onun hakkında söylenenleri dinlemeye çalıştım. Kapının ardından..." {n}İdira, mırıldanarak devam ediyor.{/n} "Duyduklarım... Tuhaftı. Geçmişte kanla, günümüzde muğlaklıkla bezenmiş. Bir de onu yönlendiren yıldız gibi bir şeyler... Ama bu yıldız onu nereye yönlendiriyor? Pek çok yol gördüm. Bu yollardan her biri, yüreğimi dehşetle doldurdu."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
